Description: Bio Inc .: Redemption is a complex biomedical simulator in which you choose Death or Life. Create incredible illnesses to mock your victim or go to the side of the medical team to identify the disease and find a cure to save your patient. Thanks to over 600 real diseases, symptoms, diagnostic tests, treatment and other diseases, Bio Inc .: Redemption is frighteningly realistic. He will fascinate you for a few hours, dipping you into the microscopic world! As a continuation of the worldwide mobile app hits Bio Inc. (downloaded over 15 million times), Bio Inc .: Redemption was recreated from scratch, it became more realistic and visually stunning by a medical simulator. Compared with its predecessor, Bio Inc.

Based on the release of HI2U
